channel.title: Projects on Rémi Morvan
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Rémi Morvan

item.title: atomPython
item.description: A platform for simulating double-auction markets to study the behaviour of artificial agents.

item.title: knowledge-clustering
item.description: A command-line assistance tool to facilitate the use of the knowledge LaTeX package.

item.title: knowledge*LaTeXML
item.description: Contributing to the LaTeXML software to add support for the knowledge package.

item.title: Pysemigroup 2.0
item.description: Collaborative database project dedicated to visualizing and comparing research results in automata theory.

item.title: Reverse Heist
item.description: A puzzle game made in 72h with Godot. Your goal: to pull off a heist, except that you’ll not be stealing anything…
